Des_Moines.Southridge Mall (Iowa):
Southridge Mall is an open-air shopping center on the south side of Des Moines, Iowa, USA. It attracts roughly 3.3 million visitors per year, with a primary trade area consisting of most of the city of Des Moines and areas to its south and east.
In January 2017, Southridge was anchored by Target and Younkers, with one vacant anchor that had been Sears. Tenants on the outparcels include Hy-Vee, PETCO, Toys "R" Us and a 12-screen theater owned by Carmike Cinemas.
